name: The Last Drop (lower third, mattiasa)
description:
Humanity through its own hubris erected The Swarm - a sentient horde of machines seeking to propagate throughout the universe. They continue by leeching energy off of everything they see.

You play as one of the last remaining autonomous courier drones seeking to deliver energy to a final bastion of humanity through the harsh Swarm-infested desert. You are armed with your trusty GAU-8 30mm autocannon.

  • Use WASD to move around
  • Press Left Mouse to shoot
  • Press Right Mouse to aim

This version of the game only has a Horde Mode survival map. We struggled a lot to make this in a week since this was the first time we used Unreal Engine but it turned out pretty cool :)
